briefdescription.para: Start tracking Rprim with the given id.
Stop tracking Rprim with the given id.
Returns the dirty bits for the rprim with id.
Flag the Rprim with the given id as being dirty.

detaileddescription.para: Multiple calls with different dirty bits accumulate.

briefdescription.para: Clear the dirty flags for an HdRprim.

detaileddescription.para: if inSync is true, set OutOfSync flag to notify dirtyList will discover the prim to sync the residual data for new repr.

briefdescription.para: Mark the primvar for the rprim with id as being dirty.
Flag all the Rprim with the given id as being dirty.

detaileddescription.para: Multiple calls with different dirty bits accumulate. Doesn't touch varying state.

briefdescription.para: Clear Varying bit of all prims.

detaileddescription.para: The idea is that from frame to frame (update iteration), the set of dirty rprims and their dirty bits do not change; that is, the same rprims get dirtied with the same dirty bits.. The change tracker can leverage this help build a stable dirty list and reduce the overall cost of an update iteration.

briefdescription.para: Reset the varying state on one Rprim This is done for Rprims, where we choose not to clean them (due to state like invisibility).
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has any dirty flags set.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has a dirty extent.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has a dirty display style.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id with primvar name is dirty.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has any dirty primvars.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has a dirty topology.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has dirty doubleSided state.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has dirty cullstyle.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has a dirty subdiv tags.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has a dirty transform.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has dirty visibility.
Returns true if the rprim identified by id has a dirty primID.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has any flags set other than the varying flag.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has no flags set except the varying flag.
Returns true if the varying flag is set.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty extent. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty display style. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty subdiv tags. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty primvar name.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has any dirty primvars.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty topology. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has dirty doubleSided state. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has dirty cullstyle. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty transform. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has dirty visibility. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty primID. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty instancer. id is for perflog.
Returns true if the dirtyBits has a dirty instance index. id is for perflog.
Set the primvar dirty flag to dirtyBits.
Start tracking Task with the given id.
Stop tracking Task with the given id.
Set the dirty flags to bits.
Get the dirty bits for Task with the given id.
Set the dirty flags to newBits.
Retrieve the current version number of the rprim render tag set XXX Rename to GetRprimRenderTagVersion.
Retrieve the current version number of the task's render tags opinion.
Start tracking Instancer with the given id.
Stop tracking Instancer with the given id.
Returns the dirty bits for the instancer with id.
Flag the Instancer with the given id as being dirty.

detaileddescription.para: Multiple calls with different dirty bits accumulate.

briefdescription.para: Clean the specified dirty bits for the instancer with id.
Insert a dependency between rprimId and parent instancer instancerId.

detaileddescription.para: Changes to the latter mark the former with DirtyInstancer.

briefdescription.para: Remove a dependency between rprimId and parent instancer instancerId.
Insert a dependency between instancerId and parent instancer parentInstancerId.

detaileddescription.para: Changes to the latter mark the former with DirtyInstancer.

briefdescription.para: Remove a dependency between instancerId and parent instancer parentInstancerId.

sectiondef.header: Sprim (scene state prim: camera, light, ...) state Tracking

briefdescription.para: Start tracking sprim with the given id.
Stop tracking sprim with the given id.
Get the dirty bits for sprim with the given id.
Set the dirty flags to bits.
Set the dirty flags to newBits.
Insert a dependency between sprimId and parent instancer instancerId.

detaileddescription.para: Changes to the latter mark the former with DirtyInstancer.

briefdescription.para: Remove a dependency between sprimId and parent instancer instancerId.
Insert a dependency between sprimId and parent sprim parentSprimId.
Remove a dependency between sprimId and parent sprim parentSprimId.
Remove all dependencies involving sprimId as a parent or child.

sectiondef.header: Bprim (buffer prim: texture, buffer, ...) state Tracking

briefdescription.para: Start tracking bprim with the given id.
Stop tracking bprim with the given id.
Get the dirty bits for bprim with the given id.
Set the dirty flags to bits.
Set the dirty flags to newBits.
Adds a named collection for tracking.
Marks a named collection as being dirty, this bumps the version of the collection.
Returns the current version of the named collection.
Returns the number of changes to visibility.

detaileddescription.para: This is intended to be used to detect when visibility has changed for any Rprim.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of changes to instance index.

detaileddescription.para: This is intended to be used to detect when instance indices changed for any Rprim. Use in with GetInstancerIndexVersion() to detect all changes to instance indices.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current version of varying state.

detaileddescription.para: This is used to refresh cached DirtyLists

briefdescription.para: Returns the current version of the Render Index's RPrim set.

detaileddescription.para: This version number changes when Rprims are inserted or removed from the render index. Invalidating any cached gather operations.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current version of the Render Index's SPrim set.

detaileddescription.para: This version number changes when Sprims are inserted or removed from the render index. Invalidating any cached gather operations.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current version of the Render Index's BPrim set.

detaileddescription.para: This version number changes when Bprims are inserted or removed from the render index. Invalidating any cached gather operations.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current version of the Render Index's Instancer set.

detaileddescription.para: This version number changes when Instancers are inserted or removed from the render index. Invalidating any cached gather operations.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current version of the scene state.

detaileddescription.para: This version number changes whenever any prims are inserted, removed or marked dirty. The use case is to detect that nothing has changed, so the Sync phase can be avoided.

briefdescription.para: Adds a named state for tracking.
Marks a named state as being dirty., this bumps the version of the state.
Returns the current version of the named state.
Tracks changes from the HdSceneDelegate, providing invalidation cues to the render engine.

detaileddescription.para: Changes flagged here are accumulated until the next time resource associated with the change is required, at which point the resource is updated and the flag is cleared.
